name: Simulators2021
description:
"Simulators2021" is a simulation game that integrates all kinds of interesting types. Each map has its own method of playing, as well as fun eggs. And buy once to enjoy a permanent update game ontology content free. All kinds of simulation games let you have fun at one time.

Game Features



·There are many game modes to choose from

·Real picture

·Independent plot of each mode

·Trigger multiple outcomes

Maps


Ready
Bathing Simulator
Thermometer Simulator

Test
Fruit Simulator


Plan
Blind Simulator
??? Simulator
??? Simulator
(There will be more fun modes to play in the future)

Version


At present, it is in the testing stage, and the number of maps and modes is not the final version. The multiplayer mode will be developed soon, and you can play online with your friends soon
